home.answer: We provide a quick loan opportunity, simplifying your life.

about_us.slogan: First Micro-Finance Company founded by Aga Khan Microfinance Agency, headquartered in Geneva
about_us.desc_1: The first Micro-Finance Company began its work in 2003 as part of a project in the remote regions of Alai and Chon-Alai. In October 2006, it was officially registered as a microcredit company. In September 2017, the company was transformed into a microfinance company and received a license from the National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic.
about_us.title_2: The largest microfinance organization in the country
about_us.desc_2: A stable path for 15 years of development from the Aga Khan Micro-Financing Program to successful transformation into one of the largest microfinance organizations in the country with total assets of more than 1 billion soms and a client base of more than 22 thousand people.
about_us.desc_3: 15 branches, 10 of which are in Osh oblast and 3 in Naryn, 1 in Bishkek and 1 in Jalal-Abad. Microloans are issued for the development of livestock and agriculture, trade, small and medium-sized businesses, improving housing conditions and education.

online_request.title: Online loan application
online_request.drop_btn: Or click here to download the file.

success_story.title: customer reviews and stories
success_story.advantages: Agricultural loan from the First IFC for a successful future
success_story.story_first: Akylbek decided to develop his farm and made a bold decision - to take a loan through the Agrocredit line in the amount of fifteen thousand soms. Things immediately went uphill, which allowed the farmer to quickly repay the loan. Thus, Akylbek secured a good start for an impeccable credit history.
success_story.user_story: «Having started the construction of a new house for my family, I really wanted to make it warm, bright and comfortable. When I shared my plans with the loan officers of the First Micro-Finance Company, they talked about the special loan product “Mortgage“»
